EGLL.snippet: London Heathrow opened in 1946; it became Europe's busiest airport by international passenger traffic and hosts the main base for British Airways.

points_nearby.name: Windsor Castle
points_nearby.snippet: Royal residence and fortress since the 11th century.

LIRF.snippet: Rome Fiumicino (Leonardo da Vinci) is Italy's largest airport, opened in 1961; it is the main hub for ITA Airways and a focus city for several low-cost carriers.

points_nearby.name: Ostia Antica
points_nearby.snippet: Ancient Roman port city ruins near the mouth of the Tiber.
